gui

Class EngineWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      • gui.EngineWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Void>

    public class EngineWorker
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
    A class for reading the output of an external chess engine on a different thread (so as to not lock up the GUI)
    Author:
    Daniele Palazzo

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.SwingWorker

      • EngineWorker

        public EngineWorker(javax.swing.JTextArea outputArea,
                    MainFrame frame,
                    java.lang.String engineURL)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs and initialises an EngineWorker
        Parameters:
        outputArea - The area to output the engine analysis to
        frame - The frame to send moves to
        engineURL - The URL of the external chess engine on the file system
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the engine cannot be found or another IO issue occurs
